Question: After winning their next four games, the Vols were upset by Memphis, despite this person passing for 296 yards.
Hints: After a May 23 neck surgery, this person could not use the Colts' facilities for practice and workouts due to the NFL lockout.
This person completed 28 of 37 passes for 318 yards and 1 TD.
After another Rosenfels fumble, this person threw the 5-yard game-winning TD pass to Reggie Wayne.
